title: My league doesn't work anymore
body:
can someone help me?
there was a time that i didnt play league much, so i decided to delete it.
but my love for the game was to big so i reinstalled it and now every time when i want to
start a game it i crash.

i hope u guys can help me

replies.body: Can you give me more details on where exactly it crashes, and what error messages you see when it happens?
